arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) identifying the repository association.

associationId.description: The ID of the repository association.

connectionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS CodeStar Connections connection.

kmsKeyDetails.description: An object describing the KMS key to asssociate. Block is documented below.

name.description: The name of the third party source repository.

owner.description: The username for the account that owns the repository.

providerType.description: The provider type of the repository association.

repository.description:
An object describing the repository to associate. Valid values: `bitbucket`, `codecommit`, `github_enterprise_server`, or `s3_bucket`. Block is documented below. Note: for repositories that leverage CodeStar connections (ex. `bitbucket`, `github_enterprise_server`) the connection must be in `Available` status prior to creating this resource.

The following arguments are optional:

state.description: The state of the repository association.

stateReason.description: A description of why the repository association is in the current state.

kmsKeyDetails.description: An object describing the KMS key to asssociate. Block is documented below.

repository.description:
An object describing the repository to associate. Valid values: `bitbucket`, `codecommit`, `github_enterprise_server`, or `s3_bucket`. Block is documented below. Note: for repositories that leverage CodeStar connections (ex. `bitbucket`, `github_enterprise_server`) the connection must be in `Available` status prior to creating this resource.

The following arguments are optional:

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering RepositoryAssociation resources.
